about_the_game:
Step into the dying metropolis of Maratha as the feared mercenary ‘Chief', and join a gang of outlaws in the war against billionaire industrialist Dr. Sarkar and his violent attempts to rebuild the nation's greatest city in his own image.



This is a dark, grounded, character-driven crime drama, exploring the dreams, chaos, and mental turmoil of two broken men with clashing ideologies, brought up on opposite sides of the great bridge. It's the story of what it means for them to find the human inside them once again, and as painful as it may be, rediscover who they once were.



In this epic four-hour-long campaign combining intense first-person shooter gameplay with deeply emotional storytelling, you explore, shoot, drive, and wreck your way through the slow-paced, dialogue-driven story delivered through the 47,000-word-long screenplay penned by writer-director Adi Chandra.

highlighted.name: Your Lead is Your Best Drug

content_descriptors.notes: A Thug's Ascension contains strong language, violence, blood and gore, references to drug use, and references to human trafficking and sexual violence.

detailed_description:
Step into the dying metropolis of Maratha as the feared mercenary ‘Chief', and join a gang of outlaws in the war against billionaire industrialist Dr. Sarkar and his violent attempts to rebuild the nation's greatest city in his own image.



This is a dark, grounded, character-driven crime drama, exploring the dreams, chaos, and mental turmoil of two broken men with clashing ideologies, brought up on opposite sides of the great bridge. It's the story of what it means for them to find the human inside them once again, and as painful as it may be, rediscover who they once were.



In this epic four-hour-long campaign combining intense first-person shooter gameplay with deeply emotional storytelling, you explore, shoot, drive, and wreck your way through the slow-paced, dialogue-driven story delivered through the 47,000-word-long screenplay penned by writer-director Adi Chandra.
legal_notice:
This game is a work of fiction. All characters, events, locales, and organisations depicted in the game are either the products of the developers' imagination or used fictitiously. For the former case, any resemblance to any real-world entities is purely coincidental.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS X 10.8
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or equivalent, 2.2GHz BCS
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Do not play with other heavy applications running!
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura 13
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: A Thug's Ascension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or equivalent, 2.2GHz BCS
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Do not play with other heavy applications running!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or equivalent, 2.4GHz BCS
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

reviews:
“A beautiful story... Powerful and well-written narrative”
—Indie Games Devel

“An engaging, entertaining crime drama”
—IGR

“A narrative powerhouse that engages with its depth and complexity”
—TheBigBois
short_description: A Thug's Ascension is a low-poly action-adventure / FPS story set in the dying city of Maratha, circa 2023. Become Chief, a feared mercenary, and experience a dark, slow-paced crime drama marrying cinematic, dialogue-driven storytelling with intense shooting and driving gameplay.
